subheading: Still need help? We are here for you.
heading: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: Why does my business need a website?
items.answer: A website makes your business easier to find online, adds credibility, and helps attract more customers.

items.question: What is the average turnaround time?
items.answer: Basic websites are delivered in up to five business days, Professional websites in up to ten, and Custom websites in up to twenty.

items.question: Will my site work on computers, tablets, and smartphones?
items.answer: Yes. All our websites adjust automatically to look great on computers, tablets, and smartphones.

items.question: Can I host the site with another provider?
items.answer: Yes. We provide all files so you can host elsewhere. You will not be charged for our hosting or support in that case, and we do not provide ongoing technical support for sites hosted outside our platform.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept credit and debit cards and PayPal worldwide. In Brazil, we also accept Pix, bank transfer, and bank slip.

items.question: How do I request a quote?
items.answer: Click any “Choose Plan” or “Request a Quote” button on the site.

items.question: What types of sites do you build?
items.answer: We create blogs, landing pages, online stores, and specialized websites for areas such as healthcare, legal, veterinary, food service, and others.

items.question: What do I need to provide?
items.answer: At a minimum, we will need your business name, contact details, and logo, as well as any text, images, or videos you would like to include.

items.question: Will my site appear on Google?
items.answer: Yes. We set up every site so it can appear on search engines like Google, Bing, and Yahoo.

items.question: What are the monthly costs after delivery?
items.answer: If you choose to host with us, we offer hosting and support for $4.90 per month or $49.00 per year (2 free months). There are no monthly fees if you do not host the site with us.

items.question: Is my data and investment secure?
items.answer: Yes. We use a digital contract to clearly outline responsibilities, deadlines, ownership, and guarantees—protecting both sides.

items.question: Can I update the site myself later?
items.answer: Yes. All our packages include a simple control panel so you can easily update text, images, and other content on your own—no technical skills required.
